newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia late palm olein stable, trade quiet.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia late palm olein stable, trade quiet.

text.p: Indonesian palm olein prices were stable in late trading on Wednesday, with sharp declines in Malaysia keeping sentiment weak, traders said.

They said palm olein was quoted at 1,405-10 rupiah/kg in Jakarta, unchanged from the opening, but trades were also done at 1,400 rupiah. Crude palm oil was on offer at around 1,225 rupiah/kg in Medan, where it was last done at 1,220.
"The sharp falls in Malaysia kept many buyers sidelined," one trader said. "Others were making bids at 1,400 rupiah."
Traders said prices were likely to trend steady to lower on Thursday due to a lack of support and lower Malaysian values.
